title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when select the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases set for those columns.
EB: The expression builder should display the alias names for the columns in the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a dataset with columns 
2. Set aliases for the columns 
3. Open the expression builder 
4. Select the dataset 
5. Observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
